explanation: [0-0] A man in a blue jersey and black pants is on a soccer field with a soccer ball in front of him. There are some wire poles at the edge of the field behind him. In the distance, there is a parking lot with several cars stopped, and further away is a palm grove under a blue sky.

[0-3] The man in the blue jersey kicks the soccer ball in front of him into the air. The ball flies to the left. The camera follows the ball to the left. As the camera moves, you can see a goalkeeper in a yellow shirt and black pants guarding the goal. He's looking to the left. The camera continues to move to the left, and then you can see a man in a black jersey and black pants on this side. He jumps into the air sideways and kicks the ball into the goal. The goalkeeper reaches out to block but fails. The man in the black jersey sits on the ground, facing left and smiling.
